Title: 5 Pairs Natural Bamboo Reusable Chopsticks with Gift Box, Non-slip Chopstick Gift Set for Sushi Rice Noodles, Chinese Japanese Tableware Dishwasher Safe, 8.86 Inches/22.5 cm, Ice Crack

Description: High Quality Natural Bamboo: An ecologically green alternative to wood, strong, dense and versatile, won't swell or absorb water, good for health in cooking and eating. Dishwasher safe, BPA free and anti-rust, lightweight but sturdy, easy to maintain/wash

Easy to Use: The length of each chopstick is 8.86 inch/ 22.5 cm fits for most people to use and they have a smooth surface. Even the first-time users, it will feel very comfortable

New Design: The exquisite Japanese tradition design on top adds elegance and class to the table setting. Non-slip design of circular grooves toward the bottom of the chopstick make it convenient for you easy to pick up even the smallest bits of food

Environmental Friendly: Say no to disposable chopsticks, can be used for many years. Perfect for your home, office, restaurant or hotel to eat Udon, sushi, fried rice, dumplings and other Asian food

Perfect Gift Ideas: 5 pairs of packages, can meet the needs of the family. Environmental gifts for friends who love Asian foods such as Japanese food, Korean food, Chinese food, Vietnamese food, etc. Our chopsticks set can make you and your friends better learn the traditional Asian culture

Made of superior bamboo, healthy bamboo chopsticks, no paint, no wax
